page.title: 02PLAYGROUND GAMES IN FARLEY
page.content: Here are some of the ball games we play, catch, {bally,}rugby, football,{ {doggy, queenie,}tennis and netball. Some sports games are skipping, hopscotch, races, handstands,{polo,} play fights and horses. Hiding games we play are hide and seek, spying, 40-40, sardines and kick the can. Some of the chasing games we play are chase, kiss-chase, cops and robbers, army, Jack may we cross the water, British bulldog,{Mrs. Piggy,}poison, buzz and{Crocodile.} Now we will explain all the highlighted games:to play bally one person has the ball and has to chase the other people. When they think they can hit someone with the ball, they throw it. If it hits them they are "up". When we play doggy we use a football. We line up opposite a wall and kick the ball against the wall in
